languages.text: {n}Уралон выхватывает обломок лезвия, переливающийся потусторонним светом.{/n} "Пути меняются, брат Сумерки, и ничто не вечно в длани нашего Господина. Но ты воистину будешь царствовать, как сосуд для своего владыки". {n}Острое лезвие вспарывает шинель и грудь Кунрада, глубоко уходя в плоть и стремясь к сердцу. Сквозь одежду Войгтвира пробивается ослепительное сияние глифов, вырезанных на его теле жестоким наставником.{/n}

{n}Uralon draws a blade shard shimmering with unnatural light.{/n} "Ways change, Brother Twilight, and nothing lasts in our lord's hand. But you will reign indeed — as a vessel for your master." {n}The blade cuts Voigtvir's coat and chest open, sinking deep into his flesh and finding its way to his heart. The glyphs carved into his skin by his ruthless mentor begin to glow so bright you can see them clearly through his clothes.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Уралон выхватывает обломок лезвия, переливающийся потусторонним светом.{/n} "Пути меняются, брат Сумерки, и ничто не вечно в длани нашего Господина. Но ты воистину будешь царствовать, как сосуд для своего владыки". {n}Острое лезвие вспарывает шинель и грудь Кунрада, глубоко уходя в плоть и стремясь к сердцу. languages.text: {n}乌拉隆取出一块利刃碎片，碎片闪烁着诡异的光芒。{/n}“世事难料，暮光兄弟。在我们主人的手里，没有任何事物可以永存。不过，你确实会统治这个世界，你会成你主人的容器。”{n}乌拉隆手中的利刃划开了维特威尔的外衣和胸膛，深深地刺入他的肉里，直达心脏。刻在维特威尔皮肤上的符号开始发光，哪怕透过衣服都能看得一清二楚。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Uralon draws a blade shard shimmering with unnatural light.{/n} "Ways change, Brother Twilight, and nothing lasts in our lord's hand. But you will reign indeed — as a vessel for your master." {n}The blade cuts Voigtvir's coat and chest open, sinking deep into his flesh and finding its way to his heart. The glyphs carved into his skin by his ruthless mentor begin to glow so bright you can see them clearly through his clothes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}乌拉隆取出一块利刃碎片，碎片闪烁着诡异的光芒。{/n}“世事难料，暮光兄弟。在我们主人的手里，没有任何事物可以永存。不过，你确实会统治这个世界，你会成你主人的容器。”{n}乌拉隆手中的利刃划开了维特威尔的外衣和胸膛，深深地刺入他的肉里，直达心脏。刻在维特威尔皮肤上的符号开始发光，哪怕透过衣服都能看得一清二楚。{/n}
traits.speaker: DarkApostleMob

languages.text: {n}Uralon sort un éclat de lame qui brille d'une lueur surnaturelle.{/n} « Les choses changent, frère Crépuscule, et rien n'est éternel entre les mains de notre seigneur. Mais rassurez-vous, vous régnerez... en tant que réceptacle pour votre maître. » {n}La lame tranche le manteau et la poitrine de Voigtvir, s'enfonçant profondément dans sa chair pour arriver jusqu'à son cœur. Les glyphes gravés dans sa peau par son impitoyable mentor se mettent à luire si intensément que vous les voyez à travers ses vêtements.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Uralon draws a blade shard shimmering with unnatural light.{/n} "Ways change, Brother Twilight, and nothing lasts in our lord's hand. But you will reign indeed — as a vessel for your master." {n}The blade cuts Voigtvir's coat and chest open, sinking deep into his flesh and finding its way to his heart. The glyphs carved into his skin by his ruthless mentor begin to glow so bright you can see them clearly through his clothes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Uralon sort un éclat de lame qui brille d'une lueur surnaturelle.{/n} « Les choses changent, frère Crépuscule, et rien n'est éternel entre les mains de notre seigneur. Mais rassurez-vous, vous régnerez... en tant que réceptacle pour votre maître. » {n}La lame tranche le manteau et la poitrine de Voigtvir, s'enfonçant profondément dans sa chair pour arriver jusqu'à son cœur. Les glyphes gravés dans sa peau par son impitoyable mentor se mettent à luire si intensément que vous les voyez à travers ses vêtements.{/n}
traits.speaker: DarkApostleMob

languages.text: {n}ウラロンは不自然な光できらめく刃を抜く。{/n}「運命とは変わりゆくものだ、薄明の兄弟よ。皇帝の手の内にあるかぎり、いかようにも変わる。だが、お前は確かに君臨する――主の器としてな」{n}刃がボイトヴィルのコートと胸を切り裂き、肉に深く食い込んで心臓に達した。冷酷な師によって彼の皮膚に刻まれた文字が、服の上からでもはっきりと見えるほど明るく輝き始める。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Uralon draws a blade shard shimmering with unnatural light.{/n} "Ways change, Brother Twilight, and nothing lasts in our lord's hand. But you will reign indeed — as a vessel for your master." {n}The blade cuts Voigtvir's coat and chest open, sinking deep into his flesh and finding its way to his heart. The glyphs carved into his skin by his ruthless mentor begin to glow so bright you can see them clearly through his clothes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ウラロンは不自然な光できらめく刃を抜く。{/n}「運命とは変わりゆくものだ、薄明の兄弟よ。皇帝の手の内にあるかぎり、いかようにも変わる。だが、お前は確かに君臨する――主の器としてな」{n}刃がボイトヴィルのコートと胸を切り裂き、肉に深く食い込んで心臓に達した。冷酷な師によって彼の皮膚に刻まれた文字が、服の上からでもはっきりと見えるほど明るく輝き始める。{/n}
traits.speaker: DarkApostleMob

languages.text: {n}Uralon saca un fragmento de espada que reluce con un brillo antinatural.{/n} «Las cosas cambian, Hermano Crepúsculo, y nada es permanente en manos de nuestro señor. Pero sí, reinarás... como receptáculo para tu amo». {n}La espada atraviesa el abrigo y el pecho de Voigtvir, clavándose hasta lo más profundo y perforando su corazón. Los glifos que su despiadado mentor le ha tallado en la piel brillan tanto que son visibles a través de su ropa.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Uralon draws a blade shard shimmering with unnatural light.{/n} "Ways change, Brother Twilight, and nothing lasts in our lord's hand. But you will reign indeed — as a vessel for your master." {n}The blade cuts Voigtvir's coat and chest open, sinking deep into his flesh and finding its way to his heart. The glyphs carved into his skin by his ruthless mentor begin to glow so bright you can see them clearly through his clothes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Uralon saca un fragmento de espada que reluce con un brillo antinatural.{/n} «Las cosas cambian, Hermano Crepúsculo, y nada es permanente en manos de nuestro señor. Pero sí, reinarás... como receptáculo para tu amo». {n}La espada atraviesa el abrigo y el pecho de Voigtvir, clavándose hasta lo más profundo y perforando su corazón. Los glifos que su despiadado mentor le ha tallado en la piel brillan tanto que son visibles a través de su ropa.{/n}
traits.speaker: DarkApostleMob

languages.text: {n}Uralon zieht einen Klingensplitter, der unnatürlich schimmert.{/n} "Wege ändern sich, Bruder Zwielicht, und in den Händen unseres Herren ist nichts von Dauer. Doch herrschen werdet Ihr — als Gefäß für Euren Meister." {n}Die Klinge schneidet Voigtvirs Mantel und Brust auf, gräbt sich tief in sein Fleisch und findet ihren Weg zu seinem Herzen. Die Glyphen, die von seinem gnadenlosen Mentor in seine Haut geritzt wurden, beginnen so hell zu leuchten, dass du sie durch seine Kleidung ganz klar sehen kannst.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Uralon draws a blade shard shimmering with unnatural light.{/n} "Ways change, Brother Twilight, and nothing lasts in our lord's hand. But you will reign indeed — as a vessel for your master." {n}The blade cuts Voigtvir's coat and chest open, sinking deep into his flesh and finding its way to his heart. The glyphs carved into his skin by his ruthless mentor begin to glow so bright you can see them clearly through his clothes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Uralon zieht einen Klingensplitter, der unnatürlich schimmert.{/n} "Wege ändern sich, Bruder Zwielicht, und in den Händen unseres Herren ist nichts von Dauer. Doch herrschen werdet Ihr — als Gefäß für Euren Meister." {n}Die Klinge schneidet Voigtvirs Mantel und Brust auf, gräbt sich tief in sein Fleisch und findet ihren Weg zu seinem Herzen. Die Glyphen, die von seinem gnadenlosen Mentor in seine Haut geritzt wurden, beginnen so hell zu leuchten, dass du sie durch seine Kleidung ganz klar sehen kannst.{/n}
traits.speaker: DarkApostleMob

languages.text: {n}Uralon, doğal olmayan bir ışıkla parıldayan bir bıçak kırığı çekiyor.{/n} "Yollar değişir Rahip Seher, lordumuzun elindeki hiçbir şey daim değildir. Ancak hüküm süreceksin... Efendinin aracı olarak." {n}Bıçak, Voigtvir'in paltosunu ve göğsünü kesip açıyor, ardından da derisinin derinliklerine gömülerek kalbine saplanıyor. Acımasız yönderi tarafından derisine kazınan glifler öyle bir parlamaya başlıyor ki kıyafetlerinin altından dahi görebiliyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Uralon draws a blade shard shimmering with unnatural light.{/n} "Ways change, Brother Twilight, and nothing lasts in our lord's hand. But you will reign indeed — as a vessel for your master." {n}The blade cuts Voigtvir's coat and chest open, sinking deep into his flesh and finding its way to his heart. The glyphs carved into his skin by his ruthless mentor begin to glow so bright you can see them clearly through his clothes.{/n}
